item.description:
They're back! ALL New lineup!

Meetup Special Price $10 -Standing Room only

 

Hang out with meetup members at the bar and enjoy Boston's TOP 5 comics for the How Men Think(Or Do They?) Comedy Tour.

The ALL NEW  lineup for the show includes host and co-creator of How Men Think (Or Do They?), Dave Rattigan from commercials for iParty and Olympia Sports and XM-Sirius Satellite Radio,  Mike Prior from MTV's Half Hour Comedy Hour, Boston Comedy Festival and Comedy Central's Stand-Up Stand-U p, Matt D., the hottest young comedian in Boston , Chris Cameron from Witch City (Salem) Comedy Contest and New Hampshire's Funniest Comic Contest and Jeff Koen. 
The show content is so glaringly clear, as the comedians share their points of view on wives, mothers, friends, kids, and careers, neighbors, growing older, love, lust, and Internet dating. Men will find the group of comedians great advocates of the male mind. Women will appreciate the humor coming from guys who have no ulterior motives other than to just make them laugh.      Show doors open at 6:00 pm. Show starts at 7:00 pm. After the show dance the night away with friends as renowned DJs from the Seacoast and Boston spin the hottest tunes. Meet new friends over the latest martinis served by the city's best bartenders. Tickets for the show are available at the door but you must RSVP with us. Seats and VIP tickets are also available at http://www.portsmouthgaslightco.com.

 

See you there,

Lisa Knight

item.name: How Men Think( Or Do They?) Comedy Tour-ALL NEW LINEUP!
